artist: Larsen Design Studio; Laura Foster Nicholson; Gessner A G; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: This project follows a design from onset to end & shows textiles in various stages of design and correction…to the finished product.  Vertical branches with apples & leaves.  Design formed by using full warp & weft;  background is decreased. Clipped twice Cream & Dk. Cream natural
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Laura Foster Nicholson%2C Larsen Design Studio
medium: Linen weft/cotton warp.  Metallic in some pieces.
title: Apple Tree Project
